text: isa varilo satyatiraskaranni kanugoni ila prasnincadu: "Allah marganlo naku sahayakuluga evaru untaru?" (Appudatani) sisyulu ila javabiccaru: "Memu niku allah marganlo sahayakulamuga untamu. Memu allah nu visvasincamu mariyu memu allah ku vidheyulamu (muslinlamu) ayyamani, nivu maku saksiga undu
